page.title: 09HARBOUR FESTIVALS
page.content:
A few of us went to visit the recreational officer for Irvine,Mr McEwing.He's in charge of organising the festival. { NOTES} {1.}Money for this comes from Cunninghame District Council. { {2.}The idea came from Mr.McEwing, Mr.Freckleton and Mr.Robertson. {3.}A good way of entertaining and attracting people to the town. {4.}Held on 18th-22nd of July. {5.}Current events for this year- horse show,Highland Games,circus, fishing trips,breakdancing,stalls etc.
Last year was the first festival and it was very successful due mainly to the excellent weather. Perhaps after a number of years the Harbour Festival will become one of Irvine's traditions.
